Html:
Hi all,

      Is there any means available through which I can set border size,like 1.10 pt ,2 pt or something.Well setting border style thick or thin is okay,but Can I have a way so that I could specify the border size like mentioned above.

Thanks

MaK

I'm not aware that any version of Excel allows you to define a border size in points, I was only aware that it allowed you to set it to predefined styles: likewise Gnumeric. As far as I'm aware, Open Office Calc (ods) is the only mainstream spreadsheet format that supports this.
